${modID}:Neurotoxin.NAME: Neurotoxin
${modID}:Neurotoxin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Corrosion. NL ${modID}:Echo if in ${modID}:Thorns.

${modID}:CastOff.NAME: Cast Off
${modID}:CastOff.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to 1 card in your hand to Retain.
${modID}:CastOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose up to 2 cards in your hand to Retain.

${modID}:BarbedAssault.NAME: Barbed Assault
${modID}:BarbedAssault.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Thorns. For every 1 Thorns lost, deal !D! damage. Exhaust.

${modID}:AlchemicalProwess.NAME: Alchemical Prowess
${modID}:AlchemicalProwess.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|<1,>1=!M!} Attack{!M!|<1,>1=s} will apply ${modID}:Corrosion equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:CleaveTheTide.NAME: Cleave the Tide
${modID}:CleaveTheTide.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you are in ${modID}:Thorns. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:CleaveTheTide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you are in ${modID}:Thorns. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${modID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:EnfeeblingMixture.NAME: Enfeebling Mixture
${modID}:EnfeeblingMixture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Echo if enemy intends to attack.

${modID}:FatalEcho.NAME: Fatal Echo
${modID}:FatalEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Echo if any enemy is killed.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card. NL Draw !M! card.

${modID}:FlurryOfNeedles.NAME: Flurry of Needles
${modID}:FlurryOfNeedles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL ${modID}:Echo if there is only one enemy.

${modID}:Futility.NAME: Futility
${modID}:Futility.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${modID}:Echo if the last played card this combat was a Skill. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Futility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${modID}:Echo if the last played card this combat was a Skill.

${modID}:ChemicalSpill.NAME: Chemical Spill
${modID}:ChemicalSpill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Corrosion to ALL enemies. Lose 2 Dexterity.

${modID}:DefensiveGambit.NAME: Defensive Gambit
${modID}:DefensiveGambit.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Energy on your next turn. NL ${modID}:Echo if in ${modID}:Thorns.

${modID}:CrashingWave.NAME: Crashing Wave
${modID}:CrashingWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Echo if the last played card this combat was an Attack. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${modID}:QuickenedPace.NAME: Quickened Pace
${modID}:QuickenedPace.DESCRIPTION: Gain Energy for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.
${modID}:QuickenedPace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain Energy for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.

${modID}:PreciseDose.NAME: Precise Dose
${modID}:PreciseDose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Corrosion. NL Gain 2 Energy. NL Draw 2 cards.

${modID}:CleanCut.NAME: Clean Cut
${modID}:CleanCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL ${modID}:Echo if this is the only Attack in your hand.

${modID}:ShoreUp.NAME: Shore Up
${modID}:ShoreUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Echo if you have no Block.

${modID}:MomentousStrike.NAME: Momentous Strike
${modID}:MomentousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Echo if the last card played this combat was an Attack.

${modID}:Oxidize.NAME: Oxidize
${modID}:Oxidize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Corrosion. NL ${modID}:Echo if the enemy has ${modID}:Corrosion.

${modID}:SuddenStrike.NAME: Sudden Strike
${modID}:SuddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy, draw !M! card, and Exhaust.
${modID}:SuddenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy, draw !M! cards, and Exhaust.

${modID}:VictoryRush.NAME: Victory Rush
${modID}:VictoryRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Decrease the damage of this card by 2 this combat.
${modID}:VictoryRush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. Decrease the damage of this card by 2 this combat.

${modID}:AncestralHealing.NAME: Ancestral Healing
${modID}:AncestralHealing.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you did not play any Attacks, heal !M! HP.

${modID}:DenseThorns.NAME: Dense Thorns
${modID}:DenseThorns.DESCRIPTION: Entering ${modID}:Thorns gives !M! more Block. NL Enter ${modID}:Thorns.

${modID}:Disintegration.NAME: Disintegration
${modID}:Disintegration.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount of ${modID}:Corrosion on the enemy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Disintegration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount of ${modID}:Corrosion on the enemy.

${modID}:Dissolver.NAME: Dissolver
${modID}:Dissolver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Echo if the enemy has Block.

${modID}:ExplosionArts.NAME: Explosion Arts
${modID}:ExplosionArts.DESCRIPTION: When ${modID}:Corrosion expires on an enemy, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:FallingTide.NAME: Falling Tide
${modID}:FallingTide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Echo if there are no Attacks in your hand.

${modID}:HonedBlade.NAME: Honed Blade
${modID}:HonedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For every ${modID}:Echo in this combat, increase damage dealt by !M!.

${modID}:Horizon.NAME: Horizon
${modID}:Horizon.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Echo if this is the first card played this turn.
${modID}:Horizon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Echo if this is the first card played this turn.

${modID}:Indifference.NAME: Indifference
${modID}:Indifference.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If no damage is taken this turn, gain 2 Energy at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
${modID}:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL ${modID}:Echo if your HP is at or below 25%. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NerveCorrosion.NAME: Nerve Corrosion
${modID}:NerveCorrosion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Corrosion.

${modID}:CollectSample.NAME: Collect Sample
${modID}:CollectSample.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, obtain a random potion. Exhaust.

${modID}:IberianTechnique.NAME: Iberian Technique
${modID}:IberianTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! Attack from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:IberianTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! Attacks from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Incapacitate.NAME: Incapacitate
${modID}:Incapacitate.DESCRIPTION: Apply 8 ${modID}:Corrosion. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IntegratedStrategy.NAME: Integrated Strategy
${modID}:IntegratedStrategy.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !D! Block. Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Lodestar.NAME: Lodestar
${modID}:Lodestar.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
${modID}:Lodestar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:MasterSwordsman.NAME: Master Swordsman
${modID}:MasterSwordsman.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack into your hand.
${modID}:MasterSwordsman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Attack into your hand.

${modID}:OffensiveRecovery.NAME: Offensive Recovery
${modID}:OffensiveRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play this card X times.
${modID}:OffensiveRecovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play this card X+1 times.

${modID}:Relentless.NAME: Relentless
${modID}:Relentless.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Energy. You can no longer gain Block this turn.
